Standardized Profile Definition
===============================



```
concept {
    IfcParameterizedProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcParameterizedProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcParameterizedProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_0
    IfcParameterizedProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_1
}
```
